001package _XXX;
002
003import ij.ImagePlus;
004import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
005import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
006import imagingbook.lib.image.Filter;
007import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
008
009public class HighOrderDerivatives_Test implements PlugIn {
010
011        @Override
012        public void run(String arg) {
013                
014                FloatProcessor fp = new FloatProcessor(21, 21);
015                fp.setf(10, 10, 1.0f);
016                
017                float[] hx = {1, -8, 0, 8, -1};
018                
019                Filter.convolveX(fp, Matrix.multiply(1f/12, hx));
020                Filter.convolveY(fp, Matrix.multiply(1f/12, hx));
021                
022                new ImagePlus("fp", fp).show();
023                
024        }
025
026}
